captions.text: Since you are out of my sight
You have left me here in a sad blue night
All by myself
Wonder why and where you were
Because my heart is still dreaming of you
Since the first moment
Did you see when I was hurt?
Hu ooh
Oh did you know when I was blue?
I dream of you in every second
I wait for you as if my mind gets frozen
Just want to scream out your name
And I miss you so much
I am still dreaming of you
My heart dreams of you secretly in every night
When you are with the others
Do you know I have been through all the up and down?
I wanna wanna get your love
Never want you to let go
Cuz I believe we belong together
If you were sad, I would always be by your side
And I could be your wings if wanted
Up in the sky, fly you to cloud nine
Through all the weathers it might be
As time goes by, don't leave me for the other
Because you are the one who protects me
Forever and always
No matter how long it takes
I will be always behind you, watching over you silently
Always by your side (x3)
Forever by your side
If one day you just left me here
I would honestly feel so empty in my mind
You would take away all the songs
All the melodies in me
Just take them away from me
And if I didn't have you that day
My life would have been so blue
Because I found myself in love with you, my baby boy
Without the heels you are still girl "on top"
No need for makeup or lipstick,
You are still the muse for my music getting high
In front of all those sleeping stars,
I want to tell you one thing, that is
I can be your lover
I can be your dreamer
If you were sad, I would always be by your side
I could be your wings if wanted
Up in the sky
Fly you to cloud nine
And all the weathers we might conquer
As time goes by
Don't leave me for the other
Because you are the one who protects me
Forever and always
No matter how long it takes
I will be always behind you, watching over you silently (yeah yeah)
Your lips are so sweet like a cherry
As smooth as fine wine
Like no other girls around me
You are the melody for me to discover
How long since your first love words,
All my paintings have faded
2.30 a.m, I am wide awake with picture of you in my head
You light up the night
You name all my songs
You make the dreamer boy go through insomniac nights
I wish rhythm of the rain outside become your lullaby
My love is one sided
But it's beyond Einstein's theory of relativity
I'll make you smile, make you fly, make you high girl
I'll make you smile, make you fly, make you high girl
I'm gonna treat you right
Treat you right
Here we go
If you were sad, I would always be by your side
And I could be your wings if wanted
Up in the sky
Fly you to cloud nine
Through all the weathers it might be
As time goes by, don't leave me for the other
Because you are the one who protects me, forever and always
No matter how long it takes
I'll be always behind you, watching over you silently
Always by your side
Always by your side
It's like, baby
I feel love
I can be your lover
Baby
Come to me!

title: MIN from ST.319 - LUÔN BÊN ANH (BY YOUR SIDE) (ft MR.A) Lyric Video

comments.text:
Bài hát hay và ổn chỉ tiếc cái Lyrics cách chọn font hơi tệ. Sau này mong 
bạn nên sử dụng font nào dễ đọc hơn...  font này hơi khó đọc vì mỗi lyrics 
chỉ hiện ra trong vài phần trăm của giây thôi. Ngoại trừ font ra thì 
animations & clip đều good :D. Góp ý chuyên môn thôi nhé :)﻿

Bài này hay mà? Giọng chị Min cũng hay nữa, nhưng sao nhiều người cứ chê 
vậy? Ai mà chả giọng hát riêng cho chính mình? cá nhân mình thích giọng của 
chị ấy lắm, nghe là biết chất giọng đặc biệt của Hà Nội rồi. Việc chị ấy du 
học bên Đức 10 năm hay sao đó mình không cần biết, chỉ biết là chị ấy là 
một người đa tài, hát hay mà thôi. Sao mà cứ quan trọng hoá việc phát âm là 
sao =_=﻿
